21-04-2025 22:33:35  371  cd workflows/

21-04-2025 22:35:08  373  it add .
21-04-2025 22:35:12  374  git add .
21-04-2025 22:35:32  375  git commit -am "add github workflows.yml"
21-04-2025 22:35:38  376  git push
21-04-2025 22:42:46  377  git add .
